channel.title: CVE Feed for Ormazabal -- all

item.title: CVE-2022-47554|2024-07-09T14:06:11.151Z -- ormazabal -- ekorccp
item.description: Exposure of sensitive information in ekorCCP and ekorRCI, potentially allowing a remote attacker to obtain critical information from various .xml files, including .xml files containing credentials, without being authenticated within the web server.
